amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 116-6 to include under definitions in the Health Care Services, Emergency Mental Health Care Services, which provide immediate assistance to individuals experiencing a mental health crisis.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Delgado amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Delgado.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Delgado amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
